languages.text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} launches a boarding party to infiltrate an enemy ship, starting {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fires{/g} and possibly causing engine {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} that cripples the ship for 1 round.
Can only be used once per round.
Duration: +1 round for every 10 points in the Supreme Commander's Persuasion skill.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Флагман{/g} выпускает абордажную команду для проникновения на вражеский корабль, чтобы начать {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}внутренний пожар{/g} и нанести {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урон{/g} двигателю в течение 1 раунда.
Способность может быть использована только один раз за раунд.
Продолжительность: +1 раунд за каждые 10 очков навыка Убеждение у офицера на посту.

traits.locale_text:
The Flagship launches a boarding party to infiltrate an enemy ship, starting internal fires and possibly causing engine damage that cripples the ship for 1 round.
Can be used once per round.

The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} launches a boarding party to infiltrate an enemy ship, starting {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fires{/g} and possibly causing engine {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} that cripples the ship for 1 round.
Can only be used once per round.
Duration: +1 round for every 10 points in the Supreme Commander's Persuasion skill.

Can only be used once per round.
Duration: +1 round for every 10 points in the Supreme Commander's Persuasion skill.

The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} launches a boarding party to infiltrate an enemy ship, starting {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fires{/g} and possibly causing engine {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} that cripples the ship for 1 round.
Can only be used once per round.
Duration: +1 round for every 10 points in the Supreme Commander's Persuasion skill.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Флагман{/g} выпускает абордажную команду для проникновения на вражеский корабль, чтобы начать {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}внутренний пожар{/g} и нанести {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урон{/g} двигателю в течение 1 раунда.
Способность может быть использована только один раз за раунд.
Продолжительность: +1 раунд за каждые 10 очков навыка Убеждение у офицера на посту.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} launches a boarding party to infiltrate an enemy ship, starting {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fires{/g} and possibly causing engine {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} that cripples the ship for 1 round.
Can only be used once per round.
Duration: +1 round for every 10 points in the Supreme Commander's Persuasion skill.

languages.text:
Das {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiff{/g} entsendet ein Enterkommando, um ein feindliches Schiff zu infiltrieren. Es löst {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internes Feuer{/g} aus und verursacht möglicherweise Triebwerk-{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}, der das Schiff 1 Runde lang deaktiviert.
Kann einmal pro Runde eingesetzt werden.
Dauer: +1 Runde für jeweils 10 Punkte "Überredung" des Oberbefehlshabers.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} launches a boarding party to infiltrate an enemy ship, starting {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fires{/g} and possibly causing engine {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} that cripples the ship for 1 round.
Can only be used once per round.
Duration: +1 round for every 10 points in the Supreme Commander's Persuasion skill.

traits.locale_text:
Das {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiff{/g} schickt ein Enterkommando los, um ein gegnerisches Schiff zu infiltrieren. Es löst {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internes Feuer{/g} aus und verursacht möglicherweise Triebwerkschaden, der das Schiff für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lahmlegt.
Kann einmal pro Runde eingesetzt werden.

languages.text:
Le {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} déploie un groupe d'abordage pour infiltrer un vaisseau ennemi. Ce groupe y allume des {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}incendies internes{/g} et peut infliger au moteur des {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} qui paralysent le vaisseau pendant 1 round.
Utilisable une seule fois par round.
Durée : +1 round par tranche de 10 points pour la compétence Persuasion du commandant suprême.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} launches a boarding party to infiltrate an enemy ship, starting {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fires{/g} and possibly causing engine {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} that cripples the ship for 1 round.
Can only be used once per round.
Duration: +1 round for every 10 points in the Supreme Commander's Persuasion skill.

traits.locale_text:
Le {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} déploie un groupe d'abordage pour infiltrer un vaisseau ennemi. Ce groupe y allume des {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}incendies internes{/g} et peut infliger au moteur des dégâts qui paralysent le vaisseau pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
Utilisable une fois par round.

languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} launches a boarding party to infiltrate an enemy ship, starting {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fires{/g} and possibly causing engine {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} that cripples the ship for 1 round.
Can only be used once per round.
Duration: +1 round for every 10 points in the Supreme Commander's Persuasion skill.

languages.text:
La {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} lanza un equipo de abordaje para que se infiltre en la nave enemiga, provocando {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}incendios internos{/g} y posiblemente causando {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}daños{/g} de motor que dejan inutilizada la nave durante 1 asalto.
Solo se puede usar una vez por asalto.
Duración: +1 asalto por cada 10 puntos de Persuasión del Comandante supremo.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} launches a boarding party to infiltrate an enemy ship, starting {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fires{/g} and possibly causing engine {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} that cripples the ship for 1 round.
Can only be used once per round.
Duration: +1 round for every 10 points in the Supreme Commander's Persuasion skill.

traits.locale_text:
La {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} lanza un equipo de abordaje para que se infiltre en la nave enemiga, provocando {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}incendios internos{/g} y posiblemente causando daños de motor que dejan inutilizada la nave durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
Se puede usar una vez por asalto.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}が乗り込み部隊を出撃させて敵艦に侵入させ、{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}船内火災{/g}を発生させる。エンジンに{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与え、1ラウンドの間、艦を機能不全に陥らせる可能性もある。
1ラウンドにつき1回のみ使用可能。
持続時間：最高司令の説得スキル10ごとに+1ラウンド。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} launches a boarding party to infiltrate an enemy ship, starting {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fires{/g} and possibly causing engine {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} that cripples the ship for 1 round.
Can only be used once per round.
Duration: +1 round for every 10 points in the Supreme Commander's Persuasion skill.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}が乗り込み部隊を出撃させて敵艦に侵入させ、{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}船内火災{/g}を発生させる。エンジンに{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与え、1ラウンドの間、艦を機能不全に陥らせる可能性もある。
1ラウンドにつき1回のみ使用可能。
持続時間：最高司令の説得スキル10ごとに+1ラウンド。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Sancak gemisi{/g}, düşman gemisine sızacak bir bordalama ekibi gönderir. Bu ekip, {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}iç yangınlara{/g} ve gemiyi 1 rauntluğuna felce uğratan muhtemel bir motor {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}hasarına{/g} sebep olur.
Her rauntta sadece bir kez kullanılabilir.
Süre: Yüce Komutan'ın İkna yeteneğindeki her 10 puan için +1 raunt.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} launches a boarding party to infiltrate an enemy ship, starting {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fires{/g} and possibly causing engine {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} that cripples the ship for 1 round.
Can only be used once per round.
Duration: +1 round for every 10 points in the Supreme Commander's Persuasion skill.
